text: Ana nehigeno Jisasi agenkemo Siriane maka kaziga vuno eno hige'za, nentahi'za zamagra maka kri vahera zamavare'za Agrite e'naze, ruzahu ruzahu krima eri'naza vahe'ene, zamufa zamatazane, kefo avamu'mo zamagu'afi mani'neane, manani kri'ne, zamufa fri'nea vahe'ene (paralais) zamare'za Agrite ageno zamazeri so'e hu'ne.
